bboxes.reason: Bounding box 2 best encloses the interactive fan speed control element, which includes the pressing area marked by the fan icon. The other bounding boxes either include irrelevant parts (like text labels) or do not cover the correct interactive area.
Bounding box 1 best encompasses the power button, including both the icon and its surrounding actionable area, clearly marking the pressing region.

The timer_button is a soft pad, as indicated by the circular region with the clock symbol on it above the label 'TIMER'. Bounding box 3 primarily captures this soft pad and aligns with the specified criteria.
Bounding box 4 accurately encloses the button area intended for activating the 'Microbe Shield/Night Mode' feature.
